JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Jaguar/Land Rover tekniker søkes til Sjælland / technician with experience from JLR – minimum Level 3
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
This is an exciting career opportunity for a technician with experience from JLR – minimum Level 3! 

Looking for an exciting job with excellent pay, work-life balance, job security, and room to advance? WiiSDA seeks a technician on behalf of an authorized JLR dealership. Apply now! 

Job responsibilities: 

In the role of a Level 3 technician, you'll play a pivotal part in upholding the ongoing prosperity of an accredited service in Denmark. Your duties will revolve around delivering top-notch maintenance and repair services, ensuring professionalism and reliability at every step. 

Duties: 

  • Computer diagnostics 

  • Service, maintenance  

  • General mechanical and electrical repairs 

About the area: 

  • Capital region of Denmark 

  • Active lifestyle 

 

Personal characteristics: 

  • Long-term perspective (2+ years) 

  • Independent worker and a good team player 

  • Open to learning new technology 

  • Focused on quality and productivity 

 

Needed qualifications: 

  • Minumum Level 3 JLR technician 

  • Mechanics diploma and minimum 3 years of up-to-date experience 

  • Valid driving license: B 

  • Communicative knowledge of English is necessary 

 

We offer: 

  • Full-time, permanent contracts 

  • Competitive Salary & Benefits 

  • Great work-life balance 

  • Housing assistance  

  • Work permit/visa, tax registration, accident insurance 

  • Confidentiality – We never contact your current employer 

 

Apply and submit your CV! 

WiiSDA provides interesting work opportunities for talented automotive industry individuals. We want to attract motivated, hard-working and educated people worldwide and introduce them to the advantages of work and life in Denmark. 

About us 

We are family-owned and operated – with a mission to create life-changing opportunities for automotive professionals. WiiSDA was founded in 2008 in Norway and became the first – and only – recruitment company specialising in the automotive market. In 2024 we opened our first Danish office. We improve the lives and futures of not only our candidates but their families too.  

For both EU and non-EU candidates, we offer a seamless and efficient recruitment process that makes it easy for potential candidates to apply, find their ideal job and move to Denmark. 

Please read the employment requirements before applying for the job READ HERE >
